name: Verify GET request to retrieve single batch data with invalid program ID

steps.name: Given  User creates request for Batch module with valid base URL and invalid programId
When  User sends GET request with invalid batch program ID from "batchesGet" and 2
Then  Request should be successfull with status code "404" for GET single batch program invalidID
